# robots.txt for TRIZ Teaching Website
# https://teaching-triz.netlify.app

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Disallow generated files and temporary directories
Disallow: /_site/
Disallow: /_freeze/
Disallow: /_extensions/
Disallow: /files/
Disallow: /cache/

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://teaching-triz.netlify.app/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay (optional, be polite to servers)
Crawl-delay: 1
